description: This file implements cryptography and compression functions, including compression routines for various algorithms such as deflate, zlib, gzip, and others. It provides an interface for compressing data with different algorithms, some of which are stub implementations, and includes conditional support for LZS and gzip compressions.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoCompress(ULONG algorithm,PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)
methods.description: Performs compression using various algorithms based on the specified algorithm parameter.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoOutCompress(PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)
methods.description: Stub function for output compression, currently returns input size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoDeflateCompress(PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)
methods.description: Stub function for deflate compression, currently returns input size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoLzsCompress(PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)
methods.description: Performs LZS compression if enabled via conditional compilation, managing memory allocation and calling the LZS compression routines.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoV42bisCompress(PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)
methods.description: Stub function for V42bis compression, currently returns input size.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoZlibCompress(PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize)
methods.description: Compresses data using zlib if support is enabled; returns success status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoGzipCompress(PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize)
methods.description: Compresses data using gzip if support is enabled; otherwise, outputs a warning.

ctags.name: AnscCryptoCompress
ctags.signature: (ULONG algorithm,PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)

ctags.name: AnscCryptoDeflateCompress
ctags.signature: (PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)

ctags.name: AnscCryptoLzsCompress
ctags.signature: (PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)

ctags.name: AnscCryptoOutCompress
ctags.signature: (PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)

ctags.name: AnscCryptoV42bisCompress
ctags.signature: (PVOID plain,ULONG size,PVOID compact,PULONG pOutSize,ULONG mode,ULONG flag)
